StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCampusContactBySchoolRowGuid]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SchoolCode uniqueiden..er, @FiscalYear int
AS SET NOCOUNT ON BEGIN --ContactName is a generalize name for any person or place SELECT
[CampusContactID] ,cp.[CollegePro.leID], cp.School_code AS SchoolCode, cp.FiscalYear, poc.[PointOfContactID], [En.tyTitle], [En.tyTypeID], [POCLastName], [POCLegalMiddleName],[POCFirstName], [Street1],poc.[Street2],poc.[City],[State],[ZipCode], [TelephoneNumber],[CellPhoneNumber], [FaxNumber],[EmailAddress],[ValueToOSS],[Remarks], poc.[City_Code], poc.[County_Code], poc.[State_Code]
FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[PointOfContact] poc INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].CampusContact cc ON cc.PointOfContactID = poc.PointOfContactID INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].CollegePro.le cp ON cc.CollegePro.leID = cp.CollegePro.leID INNER JOIN dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL hs ON cp.SCHOOL_CODE = hs.SCHOOL_CODE
WHERE hs.rowguid = @SchoolCode and FiscalYear = @FiscalYear and poc.En.tyTypeID = 3 END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
